content: skull dishcloth by shelley hilton it might sound like a strange tradition but i make a few knitted dishcloths each year for my adult sons and tuck them into their christmas stockings even young bachelors like to use handmade cotton dishcloths in their kitchens i decided to be a bit silly this year with making the dishcloths so hopefully they re not quite so boring i thought ones shaped like skulls might appeal be fun but still functional knitted skulls wash and wipe just as well as squares and knitting skulls is not quite as mindless as for regular dishcloths they re even a bit fussy but it makes a more interesting and satisfying knitting process for me and give my sons yet another opportunity to roll their eyes at their mother materials cotton 60 yards worsted weight
